Text: Glaramara is a fell in the English Lake District in Cumbria.
Triplets:<Glaramara
1:
--------------------
Text: Glaramara:  It is a substantial fell that is part of a long ridge that stretches for over six kilometres from Stonethwaite in Borrowdale up to the important mountain pass of Esk Hause.
Triplets:<Glaramara
